definition: fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Golden Xiuyi jacket , Sachet Ribbon, both pairs of instant success.
sentences.chinese: 金繡衣襦，香囊結帶，雙雙對蹴。

sentences.english: The Yu text Yi minister kneads tight perfume satchel, eyes are ruddy 1 corner.
sentences.chinese: 宇文逸臣捏緊了香囊，眼睛紅了一圈。

sentences.english: V/F/F/S machines produce sachet and strip packaging.
sentences.chinese: 立式機器生產香囊和帶的包裝。

sentences.english: On Dragon Boat Festival, parents also need to dress their children up with a perfume pouch.
sentences.chinese: 在端午節的那天，父母還要給他們的孩子戴上香囊。

sentences.english: At the spring festival people like to present each other perfume bags as gifts to express beatitude .
sentences.chinese: 在春節期間，人們喜歡互贈香囊表達祝福。

sentences.english: In some of China's southern city the young men and women also use perfume to express love.
sentences.chinese: 在中國某些南方城市，青年男女還用香囊來表達愛意。

sentences.english: Living sachet, censer for the bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 從這活的香囊，臥室中的香爐。

definition: a small bag full of fragrance used on Dragon boat Festival
embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
undergarment covering the chest and abdomen
undergarment covering the chest and abdomen
silk brocade bag, used in ancient times to hold poetry manuscripts and other precious items/(fig.) tip (a piece of practical advice)
